name: BotsGladia (with shieldS)
description:
This game was made during the "open house" at my school with "Shields" as a theme.

This is a two players versus game where you have to defend yourselves from projectiles thrown from the arena or help the other player killign himself by pushing him with your shield ! Beware of where you stand because the ground might end up falling...

We were a team of four : two programmers and two game artists. 

 We tought about a multiplayer local game with gladiators but with shields so survival type game. Robots look cool so it became the BotsGladia! 

-The game will be updated in the future here to come first:

Some optimization - 2 to 4 multiplayers - Main menu 

*TWO CONTROLLERS REQUIRED*
